attributes.action: NO - to close the gym again. Using the gym wisely is not a threat.
attributes.background: The government cannot deprive people of access to one of the most important forms of activity. It cannot deprive us of mental health. We have the right to be healthy in every way. Without gym it is easy to get overweight and depressed. Simple. We need gym to survive.

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport

rejection.details:
The Government has allowed gyms to reopen, and has not announced any plans to require them to close again.

If the Government announced plans to close gyms again we could accept a petition calling on them not to do so.
